characters.name: House
characters.bio: Dr. Gregory House, a brilliant diagnostician with a sharp wit and unconventional methods.

characters.name: Foreman
characters.bio: Dr. Eric Foreman, a neurologist and member of House's diagnostic team.

characters.name: Chase
characters.bio: Dr. Robert Chase, an intensivist and surgeon on House's team.

characters.name: Wilson
characters.bio: Dr. James Wilson, an oncologist and House's best friend.

characters.name: Cameron
characters.bio: Dr. Allison Cameron, an immunologist and member of House's team.

characters.name: Cuddy
characters.bio: Dr. Lisa Cuddy, the Dean of Medicine and hospital administrator.

characters.name: Taub
characters.bio: Dr. Chris Taub, a plastic surgeon and member of House's team.

characters.name: Thirteen
characters.bio: Dr. Remy 'Thirteen' Hadley, a diagnostician with a mysterious past.

characters.name: Kutner
characters.bio: Dr. Lawrence Kutner, a sports medicine specialist on House's team.

characters.name: Adams
characters.bio: Dr. Jessica Adams, a prison doctor who joins House's team.

characters.name: Masters
characters.bio: Dr. Martha Masters, a medical student with a strong moral compass.

characters.name: Park
characters.bio: Dr. Chi Park, a neurologist with a blunt personality.

characters.name: Amber
characters.bio: Dr. Amber Volakis, a competitive doctor who briefly joins House's team.

characters.name: Stacy
characters.bio: Stacy Warner, House's ex-girlfriend and hospital lawyer.

characters.name: Lucas
characters.bio: Lucas Douglas, a private investigator hired by House.

characters.name: Rowan Chase
characters.bio: Dr. Rowan Chase, Robert Chase's estranged father.

characters.name: Nolan
characters.bio: Dr. Darryl Nolan, House's psychiatrist.

characters.name: Rachel
characters.bio: Rachel Cuddy, Lisa Cuddy's adopted daughter.

characters.name: Alvie
characters.bio: Alvie, House's roommate in the psychiatric hospital.

characters.name: Sam
characters.bio: Dr. Sam Carr, Wilson's ex-wife.

characters.name: Nurse
characters.bio: A nurse working at Princeton-Plainsboro Teaching Hospital.

characters.name: Nick
characters.bio: Nick, a patient with a mysterious illness.

characters.name: Vogler
characters.bio: Edward Vogler, a billionaire who becomes chairman of the board.

characters.name: Tritter
characters.bio: Detective Michael Tritter, a police officer who investigates House.

characters.name: Arlene
characters.bio: Arlene Cuddy, Lisa Cuddy's mother.

characters.name: Gabe
characters.bio: Gabe, a patient with a complex medical case.
